inclusion.criterion: age and race transcription to protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PSA levels and clinical stage transcription to protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: surgery information recorded in details at end of surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Visit 1 - Day 7 to RRP2A and day 14 for RRP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bladder catheter removal and postoperative complications information
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PSA dosage requested at Visit 2 - Day 30
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: postoperative complications information, PSA results, and pathological examination of surgical specimens at Visit 2 - Day 30
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of urinary continence and sexual function at Visit 2 - Day 30
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: continence and sexual intercourse with penetration evaluation at Visit 3 - Day 60
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: postoperative complications information and PSA results at Visit 4 - Day 90
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of urinary continence and sexual function at Visit 5 - Day 180
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final evaluation of PSA, urinary continence, and sexual function at Visit 6 - 1 year - End of Study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refuses or is unable to have radical prostatectomy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Deemed a poor surgical risk per primary medical doctor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Received prior therapeutic intervention for prostate cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT)/pulmonary embolism (PE) in the past 6 months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a severe 2cm bulbar urethral stricture, which will require surgical fixation.
